Our Story Our Team Gallery Blog Careers Sensory Friendly Experiences Sensory Friendly Experiences Plan An Event That Can Include Everyone Pilot Event Experience Drive-in laser shows are a popular, weather-resistant entertainment option since 2020, with benefits like no noise worries and functionality in light rain. Customers love the stress-free, profitable drive-in experience, offering multiple nightly events and organized parking. Enjoy shows up to 45 minutes from your car, with radio-transmitted sound and optional sound systems, plus tailgating opportunities. Rain enhances the show without affecting comfort. Scale up easily for extra value and customize the event to your theme. Call 833-GLOW-EOP for versatile pricing based on venue size, power, and duration—the longer the event, the better the rate. ALI CHEELY - Director of Partnership Development - ​Director of Neurodivergent Events Phone: (252)570-9453 Email: [email protected] Ali Cheely is a mother of 4 children, 3 of which have special needs, including neurological differences. Ali brings her teaching and coaching experience from school, church, and home settings to EOP. She has worked with children and adults with autism, Down syndrome, Split brain syndrome, Cerebral palsy, OCD, ADHD, global cognitive delays, and short stature/dwarfism. Ali has also worked with individuals who are non verbal and non ambulatory. "I know how hard it is when you feel there are no events that meet the unique needs of your kids. As Director of Neurodivergent Events, my job is to create specific experiences that meet the needs of populations that are often overlooked by event planners. It is truly humbling to use my knowledge and background to create memories via epic events for these populations." What Separates This From Others In response to parent feedback about sensory sensitivities preventing their children from attending our events, EOP collaborated with Ali to create sensory-friendly experiences. Ali consulted parents of autistic children to identify key obstacles: large crowds, rapid flashing lights, loud and unexpected sounds, and the lack of a safe space. EOP addressed these issues by scheduling events at quieter times, modifying lights and sound for gentle transitions, lowering music volume, and designating a calm area for breaks. SENSORY FRIENDLY PRICING We understand the importance of making Sensory Friendly Events engaging yet calming. With flexible pricing and customizable options, Emerald Owl Productions will work with your team to design an event tailored to sensory needs, all within your budget including foam, gunge, and other fun activities. Our package deals for multiple events can also help reduce costs, while providing continuity in planning for future sensory-friendly gatherings. Get in touch to discuss your goals—together, we can create a memorable yet soothing experience for all attendees! SENSORY FRIENDLY PRICING Laser shows are unique entertainment options with pricing similar to buying a house or planning a wedding—you need details to get an accurate quote. Different needs and budgets can be accommodated, scaling the spectacle up or down. To discuss a laser show for your event, call us at 252-764-7628 without any sales pressure. During the call, we'll discuss your objectives, desired show type (beam, graphic or combo), venue specifics, anticipated audience size, sound and power requirements, location, whether it’s a solo event, customized music needs, and your budget. Our talented programmers design shows to music and offer package deals for multi-night events, reducing the cost per night significantly. One-time shows are pricier due to fixed overheads, but shared packages or revenue-split events can make them more affordable. At Emerald Owl Productions, we aim to find the right balance for a memorable laser show experience within your budget—multiple nightly shows also hardly impact the price. Once we have the initial details, future planning becomes simpler. We strive to overcome pricing challenges and bring your event to life, so let's collaborate!
